info.title: XENI API
info.description: REST API services for managing your API ecosystem.

post.description: Shopping request for a certain itinerary, dates, passengerTypesQuantity.

data.description: container of shopping success response object.

flightList.description: Dictionary of flights for the originDestination sequence.

penaltyRefId.description: Unique association key for the Penalty policy.

cheapFlight.description: Holds the cheapeast journey in the offered list.

quickFlight.description: Holds the Best Option based on Duration time of the journey in the offered list.

bestFlight.description: Holds the Best Option journey in the offered list./n The lowest quick flight.

post.description: Confirm the availability of a priced option.
The Flight Seat map display by itinerary or Flight Segment

requestBody.description: Request body to get the flights seatmap

flights.description: List of Flight Segments to display the seatmaps

departureDate.description: Local date of the flight departure.

post.description: Allow user to Create booking request.

requestBody.description: The request payload schema of create Order

additionalInformation.description: Object to support additional data for processing request

items.description: Detail of amount to charge and description.

type.description: Description type of the amount to charge

flightsInformation.description: Contain the details of flight itinerary.

segments.description: Contains the list of flight segments

priceInformation.description: Details of fare per passenger Type

post.description: Allow user to Retrieve order to view.

requestBody.description: The request payload schema of Order view

originDestinationInformation.description: List of O&D in the reservation

items.description: Detail of origin and destinations of the itinerary

flightItinerary.description: Contain the details of flight itinerary.

priceInformation.description: Details of fare per passenger Type

hotels.description: Return the Hotel content booked in the reservation.

items.description: Single description of hotel item booked.

propertyId.description: Unique Property identification key for the vendor.

coordinates.description: Hold the coordinates of the property

caption.description: Reference name of representative image sector.

numberOfAdults.description: Quantity of adults on the reservation

groupId.description: Id of the bed groups for hotel vendor information.

merchandOfRecord.description: Name of the merchand of record to collect payment.

nightsToCharge.description: Quantity of nights charged for cancellation

start.description: Date time stamp LT to start in cancel penalty applicable.

end.description: End time stamp LT for  cancel penalty applicable.

amenityId.description: Unique associated key for the amenity

taxesAndFees.description: Total amount of taxes and fees

post.description: Allow user to cancel an order created.

schema.description: The endpoint allows user to cancel an Air Order item./n Cancel entire booking.

post.description: Allow user to issue the air tickets for a created order.

data.description: Hold the body response payload details.

DocumentInfoList.description: Hold the list of Documents details associated with passenger instance.

departureDate.description: The departure date of the O&D segment.

travelWindow.description: Allow to set preferred time flight entering departure and arrival time./n Before midday, after midday

departureDate.description: The departure date of the O&D segment.

fareType.description: The type of the price to process the shopping.

fareDiscounts.description: Enter the data for discount programs

bulkFare.description: Code to add for Bulk Fares pricing - Type Private

InclusiveTour.description: Code to add inclusive tour pricing - type Private

carrierCode.description: Carrier that validates the discount code.

discountCode.description: Account code to apply in quotation.

OB.offers.description: List of offered items for an Itinerary.

OB.carrierPreferences.description: List of include or exclude carriers for a shopping search.

preferredCarriers.description: Preference carriers for a certain OriginDestination

excludeCarriers.description: Carriers to exclude for a certain originDestination object

OB.maxStopsQuantity.description: List of possible stops quantity in the request.

carrierCode.description: Carrier code of the operating airline.

carrierLogo.description: URL of operating carrier logo image.

OB.sellerInformation.description: Contains the detail of the Point of Sale

iataNumber.description: The IATA identification key for the agency

OB.orderRefId.description: The unique Order identification key./n Represent the list of individual services booked.

OB.flightsInformation.description: Dictionary of Flights for a certain O&D.

flightId.description: Unique flight identification number./n combination of carrierCode+number+originCode+destinationCode+fareFamiluId

airlineLogo.description: Logo image of the Marketing Airline.

departureCity.description: Associated City name with the Airport.

departureDateTime.description: Local date and time of flight departure point of the flight.

arrivalAirportName.description: Name of the arrival airport of the segment.

arrivalCity.description: Associated City name with the Airport.

arrivalDateTime.description: Local date and time of the flight arrival.

journeyId.description: unique identification key to reference the Journey instance.

offerReferenceIdList.description: Journey Association with prices for the same flight combination.

items.description: Hold the offer itinerary flights combination priced.

PriceReferenceId.description: Reference Id to priced itinerary reference for price details.

priceClass.description: Instruction to process the booking of an offer.

flightId.description: Flight number applicable for the offer.

fareBasisCode.description: The fare basis applicable for the component

penaltyRefId.description: Unique association key for the Penalty policy.

fareRefId.description: Unique association key for the Penalty policy.

OB.fareFamilies.description: The list of available Fare Families per carrier content.

fareFamilyId.description: The code of the fare family associated to Pricing option.

items.description: bundel service description in fare family

code.description: Code of bundle service or RFISC

priceId.description: The unique reference id of the fare obj.

totalFare.description: The total price of the Air itinerary service

pricePerOrigindestination.description: Average display price per originDestination component.

totalTax.description: The total taxes for the itinerary

markup.description: The Agency Markup in XENI App

serviceFee.description: The amount of service Fee charge for Seller

code.description: The applicable Code for the discount

fareFamilyId.description: Fare family of the priced fare.

passengerTypeCode.description: The PTC Standard code for pricing purposes /n Different from Passenger Type.

dateOfBirth.description: Date of passenger birth. ISO 8601-YYYY-MM-DD format

identification.description: National ID normally requested for FOID SSR.

visaInformation.description: VISA, Known or redress number of traveler.

placeOfBirth.description: Passenger´s place of birth, 2 Alpha country code.

redressNumber.description: Assigned Redress number by DHS program.

typeOfdocument.description: The document to declare at check-in, NI=National Identification, PP=Passport

OB.specialRequests.description: List of special services to request.

serviceCode.description: The code of the SSR to Request.

flighSegmentRPH.description: Association with Flight Segment in the booking.

shoppingId.description: Reference to the ShoppingRS to hold the Journey to book.

priceReferenceId.description: Reference to the Price Option from the Shopping RS.

flightId.description: Join of Carrier code and Flight Number

rbd.description: Reservation booking designator - Class of booking.

departureAirport.description: 3 Chars code of IATA Departure airport

arrivalAirport.description: 3 Chars code of IATA Departure airport

departureDate.description: The departure date of the O&D segment.

flightRPH.description: Association with the Flight segment to add Seat.

travelerRPH.description: Travel Reference to book seat for.

seat.description: The number of the seat (Row number).

seatCode.description: Code of RFISC for the Selected Seat.

OB.formOfPayments.description: Hold the form of payment by passenger and Service type

serviceType.description: The type of service to apply FOP.

issuingBank.description: Name of the Bank hold the account.

cardHolderName.description: The name of the card holder as in the card.

quantity.description: Quantity of the passenger Type instances.

taxCode.description: Code of tax applied in the pricing option.

fareConstruction.description: The fare construction from Pricing System
fareConstruction.example: EZE Q20 SCL 120 EZE Q20 120 END NUC 280

avgPricePerOriginDestination.description: From the total of an itinerary, calculate the price to display for each O&D.

fareType.description: The type of fares used for the pricing option.

OB.IssuedDocInformation.description: Object contain the data of a single ticket information.

bookingRef.description: Contain the information of the validating carrier documents issued.

bookingId.description: The unique PNR booking identification for Flight itinerary

ticketsInformation.description: List of Air Tickets issued associated with Passengers

dateOfIssued.description: Original issue date of the document.

couponStatusCode.description: The status of the coupon. I/Issued, O/open for use, E/exchanged, F/Flown

departureDate.description: The date of Coupon´s flight departure

fareBasis.description: Fare basis that rules the coupon.

baggageAllowance.description: The baggage allownce in the ticket

emdsInformation.description: List of EMDs issued associated with Passenger

type.description: Type of Document issued./n A-EMDA, S-EMDS

dateOfIssued.description: Original issue date of the document.

items.description: Detail of each coupon of the EMD.

effectiveExpiration.description: The last valid date of coupon validity

itemType.description: Type of Extra service/n [A-Air Ancillary, S-Extra Service
